articles.title: Exclusive: Russian weapons in Ukraine powered by hundreds of Western parts, report says - Reuters
articles.description: More than 450 foreign-made components have been found in Russian weapons recovered in Ukraine, evidence that Moscow acquired critical technology from companies in the United States, Europe and Asia in the years before the invasion, according to a new report b…
articles.content: LONDON, Aug 8 (Reuters) - More than 450 foreign-made components have been found in Russian weapons recovered in Ukraine, evidence that Moscow acquired critical technology from companies in the United… [+6773 chars]

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Ukrainian President decries 'Russian nuclear terror' as Zaporizhzhia power plant shelled again - ABC News
articles.description: Both Russia and Ukraine are accusing each other of damaging Europe's largest nuclear power plant in attacks which the Atomic Energy Agency says present a "very real risk of nuclear disaster".
articles.content: Ukraine says renewed Russian shelling has damaged three radiation sensors and injured a worker at the Zaporizhzhia power plant, the second hit in consecutive days on Europe's largest nuclear facility… [+3758 chars]

articles.title: The Irish judge tipped to lead European Court of Human Rights at a 'watershed moment' - The Irish Times
articles.description: Síofra O’Leary reflects on the cases that stayed with her most in a court that Ireland shaped, and that shaped Ireland in turn
articles.content: The European Court of Human Rights is not part of the European Union its separate, older and larger, comprising 46 countries and was born in the wake of the second World War with the aim of preventin… [+9808 chars]
